MustCombine.description: Tells the user the number of elements they must combine.

MaxCombine.description: Tells the user the most elements they can combine.

DoesntExist.description: Tells the user that a single element doesn't exist.

DoesntExistMultiple.description: Tells the user that multiple elements don't exist.

DoesntExistJoiner.description: The word that joins the don't have message, like in "a, b, and c" this would be "and".

DontHave.description: Tells the user they don't have a single element.

DontHaveMultiple.description: Tells the user they don't have a set of elements.

DontHaveJoiner.description: The word that joins the don't have message, like in "a, b, or c" this would be "or".

YouMade.description: Tells the user they made an element.

YouHave.description: The the user they made an element, but they already have it.

ComboNoExist.description: Tells the user the combo doesn't exist and they can suggest a result.

NewsChannel.description: Tell the user the news channel was updated.

VotingChannel.description: Tell the user the voting channel was updated.

VoteCount.description: Tell the user the vote count was updated.

PollCount.description: Tell the user the poll count was updated.

ModRole.description: Tell the user the moderator role was updated.

UserColorReset.description: Tell the user their color was reset.

HexMustBe6.description: Tell the user that a hex color must be 6 characters.

UserColor.description: Tell the user their color was updated.

Language.description: Tell the user the server language was set.

PlayChannelNew.description: Tell the user a channel was marked as a play channel

PlayChannelRemove.description: Tell the user a channel was marked as not being a play channel

CatNameBlank.description: Tell the user the category name can't be blank.

CatNameTooLong.description: Tell the user the category name is too long.

CatNoExist.description: Tell the user the category doesn't exist.

NotInCat.description: Tell the user the element isn't in the category.

Categorized.description: Tell the user the elements were categorized.

SuggestCategorized.description: Tell the user the element was suggested to be categorized.

SuggestCategorizedMult.description: Tell the user the elements were suggested to be categorized.

CategorizeMultSuggestCategorized.description: Tell the user the elements were categorized and one was suggested to be categorized.

CategorizeMultSuggestCategorizedMult.description: Tell the user the elements were categorized and were suggested to be categorized.

Uncategorized.description: Tell the user the elements were un-categorized.

SuggestUnCategorized.description: Tell the user the element was suggested to be un-categorized.

SuggestUnCategorizedMult.description: Tell the user the elements were suggested to be un-categorized.

UnCategorizeMultSuggestUnCategorized.description: Tell the user the elements were un-categorized and one was suggested to be un-categorized.

UnCategorizeMultSuggestUnCategorizedMult.description: Tell the user the elements were un-categorized and were suggested to be un-categorized.

ViewMoreStats.description: The message in the View More Stats button.

ElemCategories.description: The title of the /get categories embed.

NameDownloadedCat.description: Tell the user which category they downloaded.

CatSentToDMs.description: Tell the user that the category was sent to their DMs.

InvalidSort.description: Tell the user the chosen sort is not valid in the current context.

AllCats.description: The title of the embed shown when listing all categories using /cat without a specified category.

NewAIIdea.description: The message in the New AI Generated Idea button.

FailedAIGenerate.description: Tell the user the AI could not generate a combo.

SuggestIdea.description: Tell the user they can suggest a result for the generated combo.

YourAIIdea.description: Tell the user what their AI generated combo is.

ElemFound.description: The title of the /get found embed.

NewHint.description: The nessage in the New Hint button.

InvHintNoElem.description: Tells the user they must input an element to get an inverse hint.

HintElem.description: The title of the hint embed.

InvHintElem.description: The title of the inverse hint embed.

HintCountHasElem.description: The footer of the hint embed saying how many combos are in the hint and that the user has the element.
The footer of the hint embed saying how many combos are in the hint and that the user does not have the element.

ElemSort.description: The title of the element sort embed.

InfoExpand.description: The message in the Expand button.

InfoCollapse.description: The message in the Collapse button.

InfoAdditionalElemCats.description: The message that replaces any categories past the third in the info page, telling the user how many more categories the element is in besides those three.

StarterElemCreateTime.description: The message that should be displayed as the creation time of the starter elements.

InfoCommenter.description: The label for the Commenter on the info page.

InfoImager.description: The label for the Imager on the info page.

InfoColorer.description: The label for the Colorer on the info page.

InfoComment.description: The label for the Comment on the info page.

InfoCombosUsedIn.description: The label for the number of combos an element is used in on the info page.

InfoCombosMadeWith.description: The label for the number of combos an element can be created with on the info page.

InfoUsersFoundBy.description: The label for the number of users who have found an element on the info page.

InfoCreator.description: The label for the Creator on the info page.

InfoCreateTime.description: The label for the Creation Time on the info page.

InfoColor.description: The label for the Color on the info page.

InfoTreeSize.description: The label for the Tree Size on the info page.

InfoComplexity.description: The label for the Complexity on the info page.

InfoDifficulty.description: The label for the Difficulty on the info page.

InfoTitle.description: The title of the info page, also displaying the element.

InfoElemIDUserHasElem.description: The element ID, and the message saying that the user has the element.

InfoElemIDUserNoHasElem.description: The element ID, and the message saying that the user does not have the element.

InfoElemProgress.description: The label for the user's progress to the element on the info page.

InfoElemCats.description: The label for the Categories on the info page.

InvalidElemID.description: Tells the user that the element ID they inputted is invalid.

ResetUserInv.description: Tells the user that the inventory of the specified user was sucessfully reset.

DownloadedInvUserServer.description: Tells the user whose inventory was downloaded, and what server it was downloaded from.

SentInvToDMs.description: Tells the user that their downloaded inventory was sent to their DMs.

LbImage.description: The name given to the Leaderboard Image.

UserInventory.description: The title of the inventory embed, displaying whose inventory it is, the number of elements they have, and the percentage of all elements that they have.

LbTitleElem.description: The title given to element leaderboards.

NewIdea.description: The message in the New Idea button.

HaveNoElemsInCat.description: Tells the user that they have no elements in the specified category.

FailedIdea.description: Tells the user that no idea could be generated with the given parameters.

YourIdea.description: Tells the user what their random combo is.

NoResults.description: Tells the user that no results were found for the given search parameters.

ElemSearch.description: The title of the Element Search embed, also displaying the number of elements found with the search.

ElemNameCannotStartWithQuestionMark.description: Tells the user that the suggestion cannot start with a question mark.

ElemNameMaxLength.description: Tells the user the maximum number of characters they can have in an element name.

ElemNameForbiddenChar.description: Tells the user the characters in their suggested element name that cannot be in element names.

NoSuggestElemName.description: Tells the user that their suggestion cannot be empty.

MustSuggestInPlayChannel.description: Tells the user that they can only suggest in play channels.

ComboHasResult.description: Tells the user that the combo they are trying to suggest a result for already has a result.

SuggestedElem.description: Tells the user what combo they just suggested.
